extendedInfo.description: Want to calculate Sale Price with multiple discounts on an item?  Want to know exactly what you have to pay at cash register?This is the perfect calculator for you.  (See screen capture below)Features:* Supports multiple discounts* User configurable tax rate  (handy if traveling)* User can specify gift card amount* Will show sale price and total savings* All input field are optional except for Original Price* Warning if gift card value exceeds total amountThis calculator can calculate not one but two discounts (Primary and Additional discounts).  It does not end there.  You can even specify the gift card amount as well as tax rate so handy when traveling too. It will display final sale price & total savings. It even lets you know if your gift card value is more than your sale price.  Future version----------------* Ability to store transactions* Receipt total* Settings PageReviews: If you like the app, would appreciate a 5 STAR rating!!  If there are any problems please contact me instead of giving low rating.  Will reply back ASAP!KW: calculator calc sale discount tax price percentage shopping list cut slash disc closing down sale final price sale price super calc discount calc sale price discount cash money shopping credit card bills save savings register sale markdown mega sale

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app is very useful.   I\'ll take it with me shopping all the time !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This app works great and requires no special permissions. Just what i need. Thanks!
reviews.author: Jon H

reviews.title: Worst app ever...
reviews.comment: The app does nor support decimal figures and usually taxes are in decimals eg 13.5%
reviews.author: A Google User
